entries.content: Starting UserInputController ultra-modular refactoring analysis. Current file: 205 lines managing multiple concerns: DOM initialization, event handlers (keydown/focus/blur), focus source tracking, input state management, sub-controller coordination, and lifecycle management.

Created comprehensive ultra-modular refactoring plan for UserInputController: 205-line file → 120-line orchestrator + 8 micro-components (35-70 lines each). Pattern: Orchestrator coordinates DOMInitializer, KeyboardEventHandler, FocusEventHandler, FocusSourceTracker, InputStateManager, LifecycleCoordinator, SubControllerCoordinator, and EventBusIntegration. Zero breaking changes to public API.

Created delta memory for UserInputController ultra-modular refactoring plan. Documented decomposition strategy: 205-line monolithic controller → 120-line orchestrator + 8 micro-components. Key gotcha: Focus source tracking uses shared state flags requiring careful coordination between FocusSourceTracker and event handlers. Pattern is reusable for other input controllers.
